Class Health

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecshospital.Health
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Person

    public abstract class Health
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    Health models a person's health.
    Author:
    Man-Leong Chan

        public int randomizeRecoveryTime(int illness)
                          throws java.lang.Exception

      • getIllnessRecoveryTime

        public int getIllnessRecoveryTime(int illness)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method uses the Customizable.illnessRecoveryTimeMap to check the recovery time for illness 1-3. The Map is initialized by the constructor.
        Parameters:
        illness - The illness that the patient suffers.
        Returns:
        The recovery time in days.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If illegal illness entered.
